name: VSDC Video Editor Project
summary: A VPROJ file is a video editing project created using VSDC Video Editor, a video editing application available for Windows. It contains references to the video, audio, and image assets a project includes, as well as a record of the project's layers, timeline, effects, and edits. VPROJ files can be opened only in VSDC Video Editor.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
